meta.description: Hello, I’m Lukasz Kurant - Freelance Full Stack developer with aspirations to grow. And that's my personal webpage.

meta.ogDescription: I am a programmer with passion, experience and education. In my work I create simple and advanced mobile applications and websites. I help in project analysis, UI/UX creation, programming, testing, up to maintenance. I am happy to share my knowledge and learn from others.
